TopicTitle: Welcome from somewhere in the world!

Articles.Content:
Hello all, currently somewhere in the world. Found out about this game from a friend of mine and have been addicted. Currently in the military and going to school for aerospace engineering. I look forward to browsing the vast wealth of knowledge on here?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T05:29:09Z" title="05/26/2015 05:29  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by Vanamonde**

Glad you are somewhere in this world. Can't have people sneaking off to other celestial bodies, now!

Welcome!
That question mark makes too much sense.
